name: Escape from Darkness
storyline:
Awaken to a world shrouded in shadow, your memory a blank slate. With every heartbeat, navigate the sinister confines of a cultist farm, a place where danger lurks and the next victim could be you. Your only hope is to outwit the pervasive darkness that seeks to consume you. Stealth is your ally; resources are scarce and fraught with peril.

Eldritch abominations are an ever-present threat and will stop at nothing until you join their family. Quick wits, methodical gameplay, and a little bit of luck are your weapons against the darkness. Do not fail.
summary: Escape from Darkness is a single player, first person survival horror game. After waking up alone in a strange, eerie place. You must plunge into the oppressive darkness ignorant of what awaits. Use stealth to avoid danger, but don't play it too safe. You will also need to investigate your surroundings and find resources to fight the horrors that lurk in the gloom around you. Persevere, and make your way out alive in this horrifying experience. Are you brave enough to Escape from the Darkness?
